message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $140?
I understand your budget constraint, Bob, but I'm afraid I can only go up to $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still hoping to find a solution within my budget. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between $160 and $120?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price, considering the product's value.
